text: @CNN This Trump puppet needs to go in November, along with his liar boss at the WH. The cavalier attitude and negligence displayed by both of these incompetent men have caused the unnecessary death of thousands of Floridians! The numbers don't lie, ...they do: https://t.co/Hn5nXkkJQN
